query: SELECT id, title, clientName, slug, challenge, solution, results, testimonial, testimonialAuthor FROM case_studies WHERE title LIKE '%40%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user sJbh4k7T5NyPGPf.root --database Fvbi7sdgjcoSVSNraU9FRD --execute SELECT id, title, clientName, slug, challenge, solution, results, testimonial, testimonialAuthor FROM case_studies WHERE title LIKE '%40%';
messages: 210002	Connectivity Upgrade for 40 Bed Birmingham Property	Private Landlord	seamless-connectivity-for-40-bed-birmingham-property	The property at 1256 Pershore Road, a 40-bed accommodation facility in Birmingham, required a complete, high-performance technology infrastructure. The challenge was multifaceted: needing reliable, fast connectivity for all residents, robust security via CCTV and intercom systems, and a unified management solution for all these services. The client needed a partner who could manage the entire process, from initial design and planning through to final installation and ongoing maintenance, ensuring all systems worked together flawlessly from day one.

Traditional approaches often involve multiple contractors for networking, security, and access control, leading to integration issues and complex ongoing management. The client sought a single, expert provider to deliver a fully integrated, future-proof solution that would enhance resident experience and simplify property operations. The project demanded meticulous planning to ensure minimal disruption during the build phase and guaranteed performance upon opening.	Umbrella Broadband engaged with the client from the earliest design stages, providing expert consultation to develop a comprehensive technology blueprint for the entire 40-bed facility. Our solution encompassed the full network infrastructure, including high-speed fibre connectivity and enterprise-grade Wi-Fi access points to ensure ubiquitous, reliable internet access for every resident.

Beyond connectivity, we integrated advanced security and access control systems. This included a state-of-the-art CCTV network for property security and a modern intercom system for seamless visitor management and resident access. By managing the entire installation process—from cabling and hardware deployment to final commissioning and testing—Umbrella Broadband ensured perfect synergy between the network, CCTV, and intercom systems. The final delivery was a fully managed service, meaning Umbrella Broadband handles all ongoing maintenance, monitoring, and support, providing the client with peace of mind and guaranteeing optimal system performance 24/7.	The 1256 Pershore Road property successfully launched with a robust, high-speed network and fully functional integrated security systems. Residents benefit from enterprise-grade Wi-Fi, essential for modern living and study. The unified system design significantly simplified property management operations, reducing the need to coordinate multiple vendors.

Key outcomes include: 100% network uptime since commissioning; a fully integrated security suite (CCTV and intercom) managed through a single platform; and the provision of a comprehensive, fully managed service agreement that guarantees proactive maintenance and rapid support response times, ensuring long-term reliability and tenant satisfaction.	Umbrella Broadband delivered a genuinely integrated solution for our 40-bed facility, not just separate services bolted together. The high-speed Wi-Fi has been flawless, which is crucial for our tenants, and we've had 100% network uptime since launch. Having the CCTV, intercom, and networking all managed under one roof has drastically simplified our operations and given us complete peace of mind.	George K, Private Landlord
